features.additionalInfo: Pay weekly, fortnightly or monthly via direct debit. If you pay by any other means, your repayments will be monthly.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.

features.additionalValue: Make extra repayments without a fee
features.additionalInfo: You can make extra repayments or repay your loan in full at any time. Extra repayments may enable you to redraw funds, subject to conditions

You may be eligible for same day funding if you’re approved, accept your contract and complete verification by 4pm Monday to Friday (Sydney/Melbourne time). Subject to credit checks and assessment of your financial situation. Unavailable for secured loans, if an application is incomplete or needs to be referred for a more detailed review by a lending specialist, if required documentation isn’t provided and subject to system availability.
If you have made extra repayments, you may be able to access these funds through your redraw facility. You can check your available redraw balance online or by contacting us.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract. Not available for non-personal borrowers.
Must live in Australia and be either: an Australian citizen, an Australian permanent resident (permanent visa sub class holder), a New Zealand citizen, or eligible non-resident visa holder.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for finance are subject to the Bank's normal credit approval.
The maximum number of borrowers eligible to apply per application is two.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Upfront cost payable when accepting a loan.

fees.name: Loan service fee
fees.additionalInfo: Monthly charge to cover costs of keeping account active.

fees.name: Late payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: May be payable on the fifth business day after the repayment due date if at the end of the previous business day your loan is in arrears.

fees.name: Settlement cheque fee
fees.additionalValue: On funding if you require more than two cheques
fees.additionalInfo: Cheques provided to help you pay different recipients with your loan borrowings.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The reference rate is the Standard Variable Rate which is currently 13.50% p.a. Your interest rate may be different and is based on a number of factors, including the information you provide and our assessment of your application. We'll confirm your actual interest rate in your loan offer document. Comparison Rate (minimum rate): 12.38% p.a. based on an unsecured $30,000 loan over 5 years. Warning: This comparison rate applies only to the example or examples given. Different amounts and terms will result in different comparison rates. Costs such as redraw fees or early repayment fees, and cost savings such as fee waivers, are not included in the comparison rate but may influence the cost of the loan.

The reference rate is the Standard Variable Rate which is currently 13.50% p.a. Your interest rate may be different and is based on a number of factors, including the information you provide and our assessment of your application. We'll confirm your actual interest rate in your loan offer document. Comparison Rate (maximum rate): 19.34% p.a. based on an unsecured $30,000 loan over 5 years. Costs such as redraw fees or early repayment fees, and cost savings such as fee waivers, are not included in the comparison rate but may influence the cost of the loan.

At least half of our customers will receive the representative rate, or lower. The reference rate is the Standard Variable Rate which is currently 13.50% p.a. Your interest rate may be different and is based on a number of factors, including the information you provide and our assessment of your application. data.name: Variable Rate Personal Loan
data.description: Get a competitive rate and have the flexibility to make additional repayments at any time without a fee.
